text: Mario Sergio may refer to: *Mário Sérgio (born 1981), Portuguese footballer *Mario Sergio (politician) (born 1940), Canadian politician *Mário Sérgio Pontes de Paiva (1950–2016), Brazilian former footballer *Mário Sérgio Aumarante Santana (born 1977), Brazilian footballer * (born 1983), Colombian footballer
title: Mario Sergio
